verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You have my heart
And I am Yours forever
You are my strength
God of grace and power
And ev'rything
You hold in Your hand
Still You make time for me
I can't understand

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Praise You God of earth and sky
How beautiful is Your unfailing love
Unfailing love
And You never change God
You remain The Holy One
And my unfailing love
Unfailing love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my rock
The One I hold on to
You are my song
And I sing for You
And ev'rything
You hold in Your hand
Still You make time for me
I can't understand
